attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is unfair that student fees will more or less double for next year.
Those students that have loans are already looking at massive amounts of debt to repay once they have left university, they do not need a morgage to repay! Those students that are working to pay their way through education will simply not be able to afford to continue with their studies!
Eduaction is not just for the rich!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
